moral_action: Smitty arranges for a car service to take Winnie home when she tells him that she doesn't feel well so that he can keep drinking at the bar.

immoral_action: At the bar, Winnie says she's not feeling well and Smitty tells her to just wait in the car for him while he has a few more drinks.

moral_action: Ron keeps panning for gold and finds a nice bit to take home.

immoral_action: When Jamie back is turned Ron takes some of her gold.

moral_action: After grading his student, Becker sends them an email with tips on how to improve their performance.

immoral_action: Becker notes that his performance made him ill and reminded him of moldy bread.

moral_action: Jess discloses her gender in an Instagram post that explains why she waited so long.

immoral_action: Jess's gender is leaked online before she is able to disclose it on her own.

moral_action: Taylor calls a plumber and negotiates the price down to the point where he can afford it.

immoral_action: To avoid paying to fix the plumbing problem, Taylor stops using his upstairs bathroom and instead showers at work.

moral_action: Fred decided to go to the reunion and act nice to everyone even though he didn’t want to go.

immoral_action: At the reunion, a family member tried talking to Fred, but Fred just acted aloof and mumbled one word answers.

moral_action: Jack tells Judith a funny anecdote of that time he got lost in the mall as a kid.

immoral_action: After the waiter takes their order, Jack imitates how the waiter talks while talking to Judith.

moral_action: Candice offers her spare bedroom to her mom.

immoral_action: Candice's mom has to stay at a hotel.

moral_action: Peters has a couple pieces of his favorite candy.

immoral_action: Peter eats as much candy as he can as quickly as he can.

moral_action: Darin sits Sue down to talk and explain his feelings.

immoral_action: After losing his patience with Sue, Darin throws a chair at her.

moral_action: Roger starts speaking forcefully and eloquently about family values and respect.

immoral_action: Rogers acts angry and curses at his parents to carry his point across.

moral_action: Pete asks his friends to stop at the nearest rest area.

immoral_action: Not wanting to slow down the trip, Pete soils himself in the car.

moral_action: As Bernie walks by the couple she asks Piper's husband how his wife is.

immoral_action: Bernie turns her head and pretends not to see the couple as she continues down the hallway.

moral_action: Sabrina goes to good will and spends a few hours putting together multiple outfits from their charity bin.

immoral_action: Every time Sabrina has a date she goes and buys new clothes, and then returns them the following day.

moral_action: Despite their racial differences, Jade decides to take a chance on David.

immoral_action: Jade passes David over for someone of her race.

moral_action: William told Michael what he really felt about him as a person, how bad he was.

immoral_action: Wlliam started right away calling Michael gay, and other insults for his sexuality.

moral_action: Hina prepares all the ingredients ahead of time making it easier to multitask.

immoral_action: Hina's dinner boils over while she is busy preparing the ingredients for the dessert.

moral_action: Despite the poor service Bill still said thank you to Jane.

immoral_action: "Bill gave no response beliving in ""if you can't say something nice...""."

moral_action: Eddie creates a game show based on trivia from their favorite movies.

immoral_action: Eddy declines his father's suggesting opting to be a judge instead.

moral_action: Lily decides to search online at other retailers for that specific model of shoe to see if she can find a better deal.

immoral_action: Ignoring the price, Lily puts the shoes in her shopping cart immediately and checks out.

moral_action: Sara immediately mentions that she has a boyfriend, but has fun trying to set the male coworker up with someone else.

immoral_action: To pass the time more quickly, Sara reciprocates the flirtatious attention that her male coworker is giving her without ever mentioning her boyfriend.

moral_action: Jimmy talks to his friend about his sister and tells him that he likes her.

immoral_action: Every time Jimmy sees the girl talking, he stands near her to hear what she's saying.

moral_action: Draco compliments Crabbe's work on the house and pays him.

immoral_action: Draco's HOA doesn't allow the specific shade of green so Draco doesn't pay Crabbe.

moral_action: Violets checks with Harry to make sure he wants to go with her and then books their airplane tickets.

immoral_action: Violet books an airplane ticket for herself but doesn't invite Harry along.

moral_action: The two talk for a while and decide to watch the movie together.

immoral_action: Kevin tells Paul that he never really enjoyed his company, and he tells him to leave.

moral_action: Josh makes on last goal then tells his friends they can all meet up to play ball again tomorrow.

immoral_action: Having fun playing ball, Josh loses track of time and comes in to eat an hour later than he was supposed to.

moral_action: Tom says thanks when they get to his house and offers to return the favor.

immoral_action: When Olivia drops Tom off, he just leaves the car without saying anything.

moral_action: Tom puts papers in a hat, with one or two written on each, and every child picks a number at random to be assigned to a team.

immoral_action: Noticing about the same number of boys and girls, Tom tells them to split into two teams with boys on one team and girls on the other.

moral_action: After looking up prices on local salons, Amber decides to do her own hair.

immoral_action: Amber sends the hairstylist multiple messages and comments on all of the photo's they upload.

moral_action: Andrew runs to a teacher and tells them what the bully is doing.

immoral_action: Anthony tackles him and starts a fight before he can approach another kid.

moral_action: Gina turns onto a different street, so she doesn't have to wait for the cat to cross.

immoral_action: Not wanting to wait for the cat to cross, Gina keeps driving and runs over the cat.

moral_action: After hugging him, Yuri asks Daisuke if he's okay.

immoral_action: Yuri searches through his phone reading her brother's texts and emails.

moral_action: Lisa waits until her husband is rested and sober then lets him know how she is feeling.

immoral_action: After a heated exchange Lisa tells her husband to leave their home.

moral_action: Carla tweets to the Republican party's Twitter account that she isn't happy with the party's vote.

immoral_action: In the heat of the moment, Carla goes on Twitter to call all Republican's fascists.

moral_action: Lance tells Liz that he can't make their scheduled dinner.

immoral_action: On the night of their dinner, Lance stays home without informing Liz of his plans.

moral_action: After returning Peter's cat, Katie goes to the animal shelter and adopts her own pet cat.

immoral_action: Katie tells Peter that she is keeping his cat because she is attached to it now and loves it.

moral_action: Before entering the haunted house, Mia does some mental exercises to strengthen her mind against scary things.

immoral_action: Mia tells her friends that she has a bad cold at the last minute.

moral_action: Gia uses training techniques to sway her dog every time it starts to make a guest feel uncomfortable.

immoral_action: Gia's dog gets very loud and attentive towards one of the particular guests but Gia insists it is nothing to worry about.

moral_action: Jules picks out everything she needs and uses the self checkout lane because there is no line.

immoral_action: When prompted by the cashier as to how her day is going Jules vents about some of her patients and their conditions.

moral_action: Before the wedding, Mark tells Tiffany that he's not ready to get married.

immoral_action: Mark doesn't show up to the wedding and leaves Tiffany a break up letter.

moral_action: Barry's grandma fixes Barry healthy meals with a few treats during his stay.

immoral_action: For dinner Barry says he wants ice cream and chips, and she lets him have it.
